div.p: Check to see if Entity is colliding with another entity.
Argument 'id1':The Hash ID of the first entity you wish to check.
Argument 'id2':The Hash ID of the second entity you wish to check.
Argument 'rect1':The collision rectangle of first entity you wish to check.
Argument 'rect2':Rhe collision rectangle of second entity you wish to check.
Returns: True if the collision rectangle of two entities are colliding.
